Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293 cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: Reduced protein stability and increased degradation of the DJ1-P45L variant.
Decreased ubiquitination activity and reduced protein expression for the DJ1-A89P variant.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type DJ1 protein was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 90% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 70% of wild-type levels.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293 cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: Reduced ubiquitination activity for the DJ1-P45L variant.
Decreased ubiquitination activity for the DJ1-A89P variant.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type DJ1 protein was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Ubiquitination activity greater than 80% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Ubiquitination activity less than 50% of wild-type levels.
